member.summary: Retrieves a specific Asset Administration Shell

member.name: M:BaSyx.API.Http.Controllers.AssetAdministrationShellRegistry.PutAssetAdministrationShell(System.String)
member.summary: Renews a specific Asset Administration Shell's registration
member.param: The Asset Administration Shell's unique id
member.response: The Asset Administration Shell's registration was successfully renewed
The syntax of the passed Asset Administration Shell is not valid or malformed request
No Asset Administration Shell with passed id found

member.name: M:BaSyx.API.Http.Controllers.AssetAdministrationShellRegistry.PostAssetAdministrationShell(BaSyx.Models.Core.AssetAdministrationShell.Generics.IAssetAdministrationShellDescriptor)
member.summary: Registers a new Asset Administration Shell
member.param: The Asset Administration Shell descriptor object
member.response: The Asset Administration Shell was created successfully
The syntax of the passed Asset Administration Shell is not valid or malformed request
The passed Asset Administration Shell conflicts with already registered Asset Administration Shells
